thread.title: CORRECTING and REPLACING Semtech Wireless Charging Solution Embedded Inside Computers from Tier 1 Manufacturers
thread.title_full: CORRECTING and REPLACING Semtech Wireless Charging Solution Embedded Inside Computers from Tier 1 Manufacturers

author: admin
title: CORRECTING and REPLACING Semtech Wireless Charging Solution Embedded Inside Computers from Tier 1 Manufacturers
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/16/2015 @ 1:13 PM   Semtech Corporation 
CAMARILLO, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- First paragraph, second sentence of release should read: Semtech’s tri-mode wireless charging technology is integrated in these latest computers to provide wireless charging for mobile and wearable devices in today’s modern workspaces. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151016005173/en/ 
The corrected release reads: SEMTECH WIRELESS CHARGING SOLUTION EMBEDDED INSIDE COMPUTERS FROM TIER 1 MANUFACTURERS Recently announced TS80K tri-mode chipset featured in latest line of computers for business 
Semtech Corporation (Nasdaq: SMTC ), a leading supplier of analog and mixed-signal semiconductors, today announced its TS80K wireless charging platform has been adopted in next generation computers for business. Semtech’s tri-mode wireless charging technology is integrated in these latest computers to provide wireless charging for mobile and wearable devices in today’s modern workspaces. 
As previously announced , Semtech’s TS80K is the industry’s first tri-mode wireless charging platform to support all three major wireless charging standards, Qi , PMA and A4WP Rezence , in multi-mode for both transmitter and receiver applications. In addition to supporting existing standards, the platform can also be quickly adapted to support future wireless charging standards as they evolve. The TS80K, which includes the TS80000 transmitter , the TS81000 receiver , as well as a complete set of power management ICs, also scales to offer low, medium and high power options for a wide range of application needs. 
“Our ability to deliver flexible wireless charging ICs that embed in devices of all shapes and sizes and support all three industry standards offers our partners unprecedented customizability and cutting-edge technological capabilities,” said Ken Moore, Vice President and General Manager of Semtech’s Triune Product Group. “We’re excited to see our technology making its way into computers from Tier 1 manufacturers.” 
Key Features: Flexibility: The TS80K wireless charging platform supports all major wireless charging standards in multi-mode (for both transmitter and receiver applications), works in multiple configurations and form factors, and can quickly be adapted to support evolving wireless charging standards Scalable Power: The TS80K platform is the only product on the market that supports a wide range of power solutions, ranging from 100mW low power wearable solutions to 100W high power solutions for industrial tools, medical equipment and “connected” furniture applications Fast Charging Solution: Multi-mode receiver solutions ranging from 100mW to >20W of output power allows compatibility between all transmitters supporting any of the three industry standards Advanced Ecosystem Charging Solution: Multi-mode transmitter solutions available for all power levels, from 100mW to >40W, allowing embedded charging capability in furniture, vehicles and public venues that can support all three standards based on a single, easy to use, cost effective platform 
Resources: TS80K Launch Press Release: www.semtech.com/Press-Releases/2015/Semtech-Launches-Industrys-First-Tri-Mode-Wireless-Charging-Platform.html Design Kits Page: www.semtech.com/power-management/wireless-charging-ics/evaluation-kits For technical support or general product inquiries, contact Semtech’s support team . For quarterly product updates, sign up for Semtech’s e-newsletter Inside Circuit . Find Semtech on Twitter , Facebook , LinkedIn and Google+ . 
Availability 
The TS80K platform is shipping in production today, and includes the transmitter ( TS80000 ) and receiver ( TS81000 ) controllers and supporting power management devices ( TS61001 , TS31023 , TS30011 ). The TS80000 is available immediately for $3.10 per 1,000 units. Design kits, including evaluation boards and documentation are also available immediately. Semtech offers comprehensive design assistance, including field- and factory-based support. Data sheets, volume pricing and delivery quotes, as well as evaluation kits and samples, are available at www.semtech.com/info . 
About Semtech 
Semtech Corporation is a leading supplier of analog and mixed-signal semiconductors for high-end consumer, enterprise computing, communications and industrial equipment. Products are designed to benefit the engineering community as well as the global community. The company is dedicated to reducing the impact it, and its products, have on the environment. Internal green programs seek to reduce waste through material and manufacturing control, use of green technology and designing for resource reduction. Publicly traded since 1967, Semtech is listed on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the symbol SMTC . For more information, visit www.semtech.com .
